channel.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

image.title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.202.0.VNAINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra India

Codename: aurora

Version: OS2.0.202.0.VNAINXM | 15.0

Size: 7.5 GB

MD5: c59fa738a9ebba25b947d708b3eaafb2

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2025. Increased system security.
[Camera]
Optimization: Audio recording quality for 4K/60 fps videos
Optimization: Maximum number of presets in Pro mode increased, allowing up to 50 templates to be saved

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra China

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.7.0.UNACNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: 81a48e3c208123ca078eb9e7b9ac9368

Changelog:
[System]
New: Camera grip charging options
New: Vital signs info can be included in messages sent via Tiantong Satellite communications (works with Mi Fitness 3.27.2 or later)
New: Emergency SMS can be sent automatically during satellite calls when Emergency SOS is on
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
[Camera]
Optimization: HDR image quality in some scenes
Optimization: Portrait mode image clarity
Optimization: Face brightness algorithms for average exposure metering option
